Trenton.TCNJ School of Engineering: TCNJ School of Engineering is one of seven schools at The College of New Jersey, consisting of roughly 500 students centered in Armstrong Hall. It offers several undergraduate programs in various engineering disciplines including the traditional mechanical, electrical, and civil engineering fields, but also extending to newer fields such as computer and biomedical engineering. An Order of the Engineer chapter was started in Spring 2009 for all graduating seniors.
